name: Twitty's First Flight - Free birds endless arcade Game
name_original: Twitty's First Flight - Free birds endless arcade Game
description:
“ Twittys first flight" is a simple one touch game that is impossible to put down.

Play this fun & addictive game and beat old your score.

How to play

- Tap to fly your Bird to the top and avoid the spikes. The faster you tap, the quicker the bird flies. Collect precious gems on your way to unlock fantastic new characters!

- How fast are your reaction skills? This fun and fast paced arcade game will test you to the max.

Features
- Clean, simple and easy to understand.
- Endless Level, beat old your score
- Great sound and graphics
- 3 cute characters, easy to create new characters.
